panels.title: Current Provider
Current Cost
Region

targets.query: select  "name", io_role, io_instance_type, node_cpu_cores, node_memory_bytes, io_storage_size from alameda_cluster_status..node
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and namespacename =~ /^[[ns_top_5]]$/ and time >= now() -1h group by time(3600s), namespacename
select 100 - sum(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and namespacename =~ /^[[ns_top_5]]$/ and time >= now() -1h group by time(3600s)

select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_app where granularity = '3600' and appname =~ /^[[app_top_5]]$/ and time >= now() -1h and namespacename = '$ns' group by time(3600s), appname

select last("") as "name", 100  - sum(costpercentage) as costpercentage,  $current_cost - sum(workloadcost) as workloadcost from (select last(costpercentage) as costpercentage, last(workloadcost) as workloadcost from (select namespacename as "name", provider, top(costpercentage, 5) as costpercentage, workloadcost*730 from (select * from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_namespace where granularity = '3600'  and time >= now()-1h group by namespacename)) group by namespacename)

select last("name") as "name", last(costpercentage) as costpercentage, last(workloadcost) as workloadcost from (select namespacename as "name", provider, top(costpercentage, 5) as costpercentage, workloadcost*730 from (select * from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_namespace where granularity = '3600'  and time >= now()-1h group by namespacename)) group by namespacename

select last("name") as "name", last(costpercentage) as costpercentage, last(workloadcost) as workloadcost from ( select "name", provider, costpercentage, workloadcost *730 from (select appname as "name", provider, top(costpercentage, 5) as costpercentage, workloadcost from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_app where granularity = '3600'  and 'Application' = '$scope' and time >= now()-100m and namespacename = '$ns' group by appname)) group by appname
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and time >= now()-5d and time <= now() group by time(3600s, now()), namespacename fill(previous)
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_app where granularity = '3600' and time >= now()-5d and time <= now() and namespacename = '$ns' group by time(3600s), appname
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..prediction_cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and time >= now() and time <= now() +1d group by time(3600s), namespacename
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..prediction_cost_app where granularity = '3600' and time >= now() and time <= now() +1d and namespacename = '$ns' group by time(3600s), appname
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..prediction_cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and time >= now() and time <= now() +1d group by time(3600s), namespacename

select mean(costpercentage)  from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_namespace where granularity = '21600' and time >= now()-5w and time <= now() group by time(21600s, now()), namespacename fill(previous)
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_app where granularity = '21600'  and time >= now()-5w and time <= now() and namespacename = '$ns' group by time(21600s), appname
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..prediction_cost_namespace where granularity = '21600' and time >= now() and time <= now() +1w group by time(21600s), namespacename
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..prediction_cost_app where granularity = '21600' and time >= now() and time <= now() +1w and namespacename = '$ns' group by time(21600s), appname
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..prediction_cost_namespace where granularity = '21600' and time >= now() and time <= now() +1w group by time(21600s), namespacename

select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_namespace where granularity = '86400' and time >= now()-20w and time <= now() group by time(86400s, now()), namespacename fill(previous)
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_app where granularity = '86400' and time >= now()-20w and time <= now() and namespacename = '$ns' group by time(86400s), appname
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..prediction_cost_namespace where granularity = '86400' and time >= now() and time <= now() +4w group by time(86400s), namespacename
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..prediction_cost_app where granularity = '86400' and time >= now() and time <= now() +4w and namespacename = '$ns' group by time(86400s), appname
select mean(costpercentage) from alameda_fedemeter..prediction_cost_namespace where granularity = '86400' and time >= now() and time <= now() +4w group by time(86400s), namespacename

panels.content:
<script>
  $('#panel-12 .table-panel-table tbody').on('DOMSubtreeModified', function() {
    var dataLength = this.children.length;
    if (dataLength > 0) {
      for(var i = 0; i < dataLength; i++) {
        if (this.children[i].innerText.indexOf('Idleness') !== -1) {
          this.children[i].style.backgroundColor = '#3f6833';
        }
      }
    }
  });
</script>
<style>
  #panel-36 {
   display:none
}
  .graph-legend-content {
   height:20px !important; 
}
  #panel-14, #panel-27, #panel-28 {
   z-index:2;
}
  #panel-32, #panel-33, #panel-34 {
   margin-left:-1%;
}
  #panel-32 div.flot-y-axis, #panel-33 div.flot-y-axis, #panel-34 div.flot-y-axis {
   display:none !important;
}
  #panel-32 div.panel-content {
   left:-8%;
}
  #panel-33 div.panel-content,#panel-34 div.panel-content {
   left:-7%;
}
  .pieLabel > div {
   color: white !important;
}
 </style>
panels.title: Panel Title

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_fedemeter from history_cost_app with key = "namespacename" where granularity = '3600' and time >= now()-1h
list.label: Namespace
list.name: ns
list.query: show tag values on alameda_fedemeter from history_cost_app with key = "namespacename" where granularity = '3600' and time >= now()-1h

list.definition: select io_provider from alameda_cluster_status..node order by time desc limit 1
list.name: current_provider
list.query: select io_provider from alameda_cluster_status..node order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select sum(totalcost) as totalcost from alameda_fedemeter..calculate_instance where time >= now() -60m group by time(1s) fill(none) order by time desc limit 1
list.name: current_cost
list.query: select sum(totalcost) as totalcost from alameda_fedemeter..calculate_instance where time >= now() -60m group by time(1s) fill(none) order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select io_region from alameda_cluster_status..node order by time desc limit 1
list.name: current_region
list.query: select io_region from alameda_cluster_status..node order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select namespacename from (select top(costpercentage, namespacename, 5) from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and time >= now() -1h )
list.name: ns_top_5
list.query: select namespacename from (select top(costpercentage, namespacename, 5) from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_namespace where granularity = '3600' and time >= now() -1h )

list.definition: select appname from (select top(costpercentage, appname, 5) from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_app where granularity = '3600' and time >= now() -1h)
list.name: app_top_5
list.query: select appname from (select top(costpercentage, appname, 5) from alameda_fedemeter..history_cost_app where granularity = '3600' and time >= now() -1h)
